2. Despite diligent checking and ordering of fuel, there are times when:
a. Loadshedding stages dramatically increase fuel usage
b. Prolonged power  failures due to grid instability in our rural area may cause fuel to be depleted.
c. Deliveries of fuel are delayed because of strike action
d. The generator breaks down
3. In such circumstances, the ability of the institution to provide care may
